title: How Norris ended Leclerc's best 2025 F1 win shot amid Monaco GP 'fun and games'
summary: Lando Norris realised his dream of winning the Monaco Grand Prix in 2025, as the new mandatory two-stop rule brought creative strategies in the midfield, writesMark Hughes

qa_pairs.question: Who won the Monaco Grand Prix in 2025?
What new rule was introduced in the 2025 Monaco Grand Prix that influenced race strategies?
Which driver was affected by Norris's win in the context of their championship aspirations?
